chapter.title: Implementing support as a cloud provider
chapter.para: Cloud providers need to create #CloudProviderAccountExporter objects for every account they like to expose to the API. To provide the account details clients need to listen to the signals provided by the exporter and return their information there. All #CloudProviderAccountExporter objects need to be added to the #CloudProviderExporter by calling cloud_provider_exporter_add_account().
To register your cloud provider you also need to provide a file in DATADIR/cloud-providers.
